briefdescription.para: initializes A, Bu, and Bv after border parameterization.

detaileddescription.para: Fill the border vertices' lines in both linear systems: "u = constant" and "v = constant".

parameterdescription.para: must be a model of ReadWritePropertyMap with boost::graph_traits<Triangle_mesh>::vertex_descriptor as key type and Point_2 (type deduced from Triangle_mesh using Kernel_traits) as value type.
must be a model of ReadablePropertyMap with boost::graph_traits<Triangle_mesh>::vertex_descriptor as key type and a unique integer as value type.
the matrix in both linear system
the right hand side vector in the linear system of x coordinates
the right hand side vector in the linear system of y coordinates
a triangulated surface
a halfedge descriptor on the boundary of mesh
an instantiation of the class VertexUVmap
an instantiation of the class VertexIndexMap

simplesect.para: Vertices must be indexed (vimap must be initialized).
A, Bu, and Bv must be allocated.

memberdef.name: parameterize

briefdescription.para: computes a one-to-one mapping from a triangular 3D surface mesh to a piece of the 2D space.

detaileddescription.para: The mapping is piecewise linear (linear in each triangle). The result is the (u,v) pair image of each vertex of the 3D surface.

parameterdescription.para: must be a model of ReadWritePropertyMap with boost::graph_traits<Triangle_mesh>::vertex_descriptor as key type and Point_2 (type deduced from Triangle_mesh using Kernel_traits) as value type.
must be a model of ReadablePropertyMap with boost::graph_traits<Triangle_mesh>::vertex_descriptor as key type and a unique integer as value type.
must be a model of ReadWritePropertyMap with boost::graph_traits<Triangle_mesh>::vertex_descriptor as key type and a Boolean as value type.
a triangulated surface
a halfedge descriptor on the boundary of mesh
an instantiation of the class VertexUVmap
an instantiation of the class VertexIndexMap
an instantiation of the class VertexParameterizedMap
an integer number of iterations to run the parameterization

simplesect.para: tmesh must be a triangular mesh.
The mesh border must be mapped onto a convex polygon.
The vertices must be indexed (vimap must be initialized).

memberdef.argsstring: (Triangle_mesh &tmesh, halfedge_descriptor bhd, VertexUVmap uvmap, const unsigned int iterations=15)
memberdef.name: parameterize

briefdescription.para: The class Iterative_authalic_parameterizer_3 implements the Iterative Parameterization algorithm, as described by Jain et al.

detaileddescription.para: This parameterization is a fixed border parameterization and is part of the authalic parameterization family, meaning that it aims to minimize area distortion between the input surface mesh and the parameterized output. More precisely, the approach used by this parameterizer is to iteratively redistribute the $ L_2$ stretch - as defined by Sander et al. [11] - over the mesh.

parameterdescription.para: must be a model of FaceGraph.
is a strategy to parameterize the surface border and must be a model of Parameterizer_3. Default: Circular_border_arc_length_parameterizer_3<TriangleMesh_>

must be a model of SparseLinearAlgebraTraits_d. Note that the system is not symmetric because border vertices are not removed from the system. Default: If Eigen 3.1 (or greater) is available and CGAL_EIGEN3_ENABLED is defined, then an overload of Eigen_solver_traits is provided as default parameter: CGAL::Eigen_solver_traits< Eigen::BiCGSTAB<Eigen_sparse_matrix<double>::EigenType, Eigen::IncompleteLUT<double>>>
